title: Product Growthâ€™s 2025 Year in Review: Your Complete AI PM Course, PM MBA & Career Roadmaps
subtitle: 160+ Articles & Podcasts Organized Into 6 Infographics
author: Aakash Gupta
content_html:
Over 2025, I published:

  • 90 newsletter deep dives

  • 70 podcast episodes

  • Reached 205K+ subscribers*

  • Sent over 500,000 words of content

*Entirely organically - I’ve never paid for ads.

So today, I’m organizing ALL of my 2025 content into 6 comprehensive roadmaps:

  1. Newsletter 2025 Year in Review - Every article organized by theme

  2. Podcast 2025 Year in Review - Every episode organized by topic

  3. The Complete PM MBA - Your free product management education

  4. The Complete AI PM MBA - Your AI PM certification

  5. Roadmap to Become an AI PM - From zero to $300K+ AI PM role

  6. Roadmap to Become a PM - From aspiring to landing your dream role

Happy 2026! I have some big things planned.

Subscribe now

P.S. I’m conducting my second Land PM Job Cohort starting in February! We have 25 slots left. Join up before they all sell out.

To another incredible year of learning together 🍻
